comments.raw_text:
Probably start with layout:text

That said, the data in comment 5 is from a build with no symbols and I don't understand how we can get a null-deref crash when tearing down an nsCOMArray (per comment 4) unless one of the entries is dead....
comments.text:
Probably start with layout:text

That said, the data in comment 5 is from a build with no symbols and I don't understand how we can get a null-deref crash when tearing down an nsCOMArray (per comment 4) unless one of the entries is dead....
